tool_description:
2Factor.in provides extremely simple to use APIs for implementing 2Factor Authentication ( Phone verification ) with just 1 API Call.
Best Part of 2Factor.in solution is its Fast, Reliable & Economical too.
name: 2Factor Authentication - India
title: 2Factor Authentication - India

api_list.name: Check Balance - Addon Services
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://2factor.p.rapidapi.com/API/V1/293832-67745-11e5-88de-5600000c6b13/ADDON_SERVICES/BAL/TRANSACTIONAL_SMS"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "2factor.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://2factor.p.rapidapi.com/API/V1/{api_key}/ADDON_SERVICES/BAL/{service_name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "2factor.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Sending Voice OTP ( Custom OTP )
api_list.description: This endpoint is used to send VOICE OTP to India

required_parameters.name: otp
required_parameters.description: 4 Digit ( Numeric ) OTP code to be sent

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://2factor.p.rapidapi.com/API/V1/293832-67745-11e5-88de-5600000c6b13/VOICE/9911991199/4499"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "2factor.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://2factor.p.rapidapi.com/API/V1/{api_key}/VOICE/{phone_number}/{otp}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "2factor.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Sending SMS OTP ( Custom OTP )
api_list.description: This endpoint is used to send Custom SMS OTP to India

required_parameters.name: otp
required_parameters.description: 4-6 Digit ( Numeric ) OTP code to be sent

api_list.name: Verify SMS OTP Input
api_list.description: This endpoint is useful in verifying user entered OTP with sent OTP

required_parameters.name: otp_input
required_parameters.description: OTP Value input by end user

required_parameters.name: session_id
required_parameters.description: Verification session id returned in send OTP step

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://2factor.p.rapidapi.com/API/V1/293832-67745-11e5-88de-5600000c6b13/SMS/VERIFY/4a4b52d9-be3e-4f2c-b66e-f4141091b876/1234"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "2factor.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://2factor.p.rapidapi.com/API/V1/{api_key}/SMS/VERIFY/{session_id}/{otp_input}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "2factor.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Sending SMS OTP ( Auto Generated OTP - Custom Template  )

api_list.name: Pull Delivery Report

required_parameters.name: session_id
required_parameters.description: Session Id Returned By Send SMS Step

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://2factor.p.rapidapi.com/API/V1/293832-67745-11e5-88de-5600000c6b13/ADDON_SERVICES/RPT/TSMS/Session Id Goes here"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "2factor.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://2factor.p.rapidapi.com/API/V1/{api_key}/ADDON_SERVICES/RPT/TSMS/{session_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "2factor.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
